    com.solana.mobilewalletadapter.clientlib.protocol.MobileWalletAdapterClient.AuthorizationResult.create(String, byte[], String, Uri)
    com.solana.mobilewalletadapter.clientlib.protocol.MobileWalletAdapterClient.authorize(Uri, Uri, String, String)
    com.solana.mobilewalletadapter.clientlib.protocol.MobileWalletAdapterClient.signAndSendTransactions(byte[][], Integer)
    Consumers of MobileWalletAdapterClient.signAndSendTransactions(byte[][], Integer) should migrate to MobileWalletAdapterClient.signAndSendTransactions(byte[][], Integer, String, Boolean, Integer, Boolean) which exposes more transactions options according to the latest protocol specification.
    com.solana.mobilewalletadapter.clientlib.protocol.MobileWalletAdapterClient.signMessages(byte[][], byte[][])
    Consumers of MobileWalletAdapterClient.signMessages(byte[][], byte[][]) should migrate to MobileWalletAdapterClient.signMessagesDetached(byte[][], byte[][]), which offers an improved return type, separating the message from the signatures
    com.solana.mobilewalletadapter.clientlib.protocol.MobileWalletAdapterClient.signTransactions(byte[][])
